source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Learn ZBrush with this Beginners Compendium Online Course

visible_instructors.name: UK Online
visible_instructors.job_title: Online training centre based in the UK creative studies
visible_instructors.title: UK Online Training Centre

items.headline: Complete Beginners Guide to all Major Features of Pixelogics Zbrush
objectives_summary: Students will have the ability to undertake Intermediate to advanced tutorials at the end of this course
By the end of the course you will understand Zbrush and be able to confidently create your own masterpieces

items.title: Concept Art Masterclass | Create Conceptual Art from Scratch
items.headline: The Complete guide to creating fully fledged Conceptual Artworks from Scratch in 100% Realtime with no parts skipped!
objectives_summary: Creating a Full Conceptual Artwork from scratch
3D Modelling in Blender
Advanced Painting Techniques in Photoshop

items.title: Gradient Animations in After Effects

visible_instructors.name: Jonathan
visible_instructors.title: Jonathan Lam
visible_instructors.job_title: Marketing Artist | Concept Artist | Graphic Designer

items.headline: Start learning Adobe After Effects by creating Gradient Animations in this quick and easy course.
objectives_summary: You will be able to use Adobe After Effects to a basic level
You will be able to create a simple gradient design
You will be able to create a simple gradient animation

items.title: Mantaflow Fire & Smoke Simulation Guide in Blender
items.headline: Learn everything there is to know about the Fire and Smoke Simulation in Blender!
objectives_summary: The student will learn all the functions of the Smoke and Fire Simulation in Blender.
The student will learn how to effectively create realistic smoke and fire in Blender

items.title: Learn Hand-Painted Texturing for Game Environments

visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!

items.headline: Explore the techniques for modeling and texturing this stylized cabin using hand-painted textures!
objectives_summary: Understand the basic modeling principles to create and UV the assets in the video
Learn the hand-painted texturing style to texture the stylized cabin

items.title: Beginners Guide to the Particle System in Blender 2.8
items.headline: Learn all about the Amazing Particle System and how to use it in Blender 3D
objectives_summary: The students will be able to create their own simulations using particles
The students will be able to create grass and hair using the particle system in Blender
Students will feel comfortable with the Particle System

items.title: The Complete 3D Artist: Learn 3D Art by Creating 3 Scenes
items.headline: Learn 3D Modeling, Sculpting, Lighting, Texturing, Rendering & Compositing using Blender in One Complete Course
objectives_summary: The skills to model high quality 3D models
Learn the fundamentals of digital sculpting in Blender
Add shaders and textures to your 3D models

items.title: Maya 2017 - Create realistic images using Arnold renderer
items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of Arnold renderer by rendering a realistic scene in Autodesk Maya 2017
objectives_summary: Render realistic images using Arnold renderer inside Maya
Use the different light types in Arnold
Use the aiStandard shader to create wood, glass and metal materials

items.title: Character sculpting with blender: Create a stylized warrior
items.headline: Learn everything you need to create 3D characters with Blender's sculpt mode tools
objectives_summary: All the digital sculpting workflow for characters, whether for video games, animation, rendering or 3D printing
Apply different modeling techniques to solve specific requirements to develop a character
How to use the Blender sculpt mode to create your own characters

items.title: Master Houdini FX: Create Stunning Visual Effects rigs
items.headline: Create VFX rigs in Houdini from the ground up, go from beginning to advanced, Anyone can learn Houdini with this course
objectives_summary: Learn from an Award Winning industry professional with 20 years of experience creating visual effects for blockbuster feature films, Tv shows, and music videos.
You will learn how to create basic rigs all the way up to advanced setups using VEX and Hscript to automate a lot of the setup process.
Everything from Particles and Grains, Wires, RBD’s, Pyro and smoke, vellum, and Flip will be covered.

items.title: Create and sell animated videos in minutes using PowerPoint
items.headline: The ultimate guide to creating animated videos using only PowerPoint and with no animation skills
objectives_summary: create animated videos in minutes
create and sell animated videos for profit
make money selling video creation services

items.title: Learn How to Draw and Paint in Photoshop
items.headline: Tips and Techniques for Digital Art
objectives_summary: You will learn dynamic drawing and painting skills for Photoshop or any similar application
You'll learn how to use powerful art tools, such as brush sets, pen tools, and selection tools
You'll learn how to build up a drawing or painting gradually, using a systematic approach

items.title: Master Photorealistic Rendering With Corona Renderer!
items.headline: Learn lighting, creating realistic materials, setting up striking compositions in Corona Renderer and post-production!
objectives_summary: Rendering With Corona Renderer in 3Ds Max
Creating Realistic Renders
Rendering an Interior Scene

items.title: Complete Game Character Workflow 02 Texturing and Rendering
items.headline: The entire workflow from texturing to material, lighting, and rendering for characters after modeling.
objectives_summary: Character Texturing
Substance Designer
Substance Painter

items.title: Architectural Exterior Rendering Masterclass 3ds Max + V-Ray

visible_instructors.name: Jake
visible_instructors.title: Jake Denham BA, MA, Official V-Ray Mentor
visible_instructors.display_name: Jake Denham BA, MA, Official V-Ray Mentor

items.headline: FULL COURSE TAUGHT BY AN OFFICIAL V-RAY MENTOR. Create Photorealistic 3D Renderings with 3ds Max + V-Ray from scratch.
objectives_summary: Completely Updated with all new 3ds Max and V-Ray Next and V-Ray 5 lessons
You'll learn the essential tools for modelling, mapping, materials, lighting and rendering.
Improve the 3D rendering skills you need to create and sell 3D renders

items.title: Generate a 3D model from photos using Agisoft PhotoScan
items.headline: Easily create accurate 3D models of real world objects using photography. This course will cover the basics.
objectives_summary: Generate 3D models from a series of photos
Generate a texture for said 3D model from a series of photos
Optimize camera settings for good results
